cast.name: 露波芙·托卡丽娜 Lyubov Tolkalina
玛丽娜·佩特连科 Marina Petrenko
阿丽欧娜·科洛米娜 Alyona Kolomina
亚历山大·奥斯特犹科夫 Aleksandr Ustyugov
帕维尔·特鲁比纳 Pavel Trubiner

introduction: 1979. (inrussian) The apartment of the famous ballerina was robbed in Moscow. The housekeeper was killed, the attackers fled. Investigator anokhin invites his friend journalist yeltsov to help in the search for criminals. At the same time, a high-profile bank robbery is taking place in yerevan, which is being carried out by a specially released mahaon bear bear. At first glance, the two cases seem completely unrelated. More deeply immersed with the investigation, spetskor yeltsov understands that he has found a conspiracy, the blood threads of which are drawn to the highest levels of power.
